title: Division in the extended real number system

blocks.name: cxdiv
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include division of extended reals.
blocks.origin: const class cxdiv { /e }

blocks.name: diff.cxdiv.s
diff.cxdiv.c
diff.cxdiv.w
df-xdiv
blocks.content: Define division over extended real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: xdivval
blocks.content: Value of division: the (unique) element ` x ` such that ` ( B x. x ) = A ` . This is meaningful only when ` B ` is nonzero. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm xdivval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cxdiv, c1), crio(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3impb(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0), wceq(co(c0, cxdiv, c1), crio(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0))))
  sylan2br(wcel(c0, cxr), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cxdiv, c1), crio(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0))), wcel(c1, cdif(cr, csn(nat0))))
  eldifsn(c1, cr, nat0)
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, cxr, c1, cdif(cr, csn(nat0)), cxdiv, crio(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0)), crio(s0, cxr, wceq(co(cv(hs1), cxmu, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), crio(s0, cxr, wceq(co(cv(hs1), cxmu, cv(s0)), c0)))
  riotabidva(s0, cxr, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cxmu, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cxmu, cv(s0)), c0))
  eqeq2d(co(cv(hs1), cxmu, cv(s0)), cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cxr)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cxr))
  riotabidva(s0, cxr, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cxmu, cv(s0)), c0), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs1), cxmu, cv(s0)), c0, co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cxr)))
  oveq1d(cv(hs1), cxmu, cv(s0), c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cxr)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cxr))
  df-xdiv(hs0, hs1, s0)
  riotaex(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cr, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(crio(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cxr)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cdif(cr, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs1.c(crio(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xdivval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ≠ 0)→(c0[/e]c1)= iota(s0 ∈ ℝ*,(c1[×]s0)= c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3impb(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ, c1 ≠ 0, (c0[/e]c1)= iota(s0 ∈ ℝ*,(c1[×]s0)= c0))
  sylan2br(c0 ∈ ℝ*, (c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ≠ 0), (c0[/e]c1)= iota(s0 ∈ ℝ*,(c1[×]s0)= c0), c1 ∈(ℝ \ { 0 }))
  eldifsn(c1, cr, nat0)
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, cxr, c1, (ℝ \ { 0 }), cxdiv, iota(s0 ∈ ℝ*,(c1[×]s0)= c0), iota(s0 ∈ ℝ*,(hs1[×]s0)= hs0), iota(s0 ∈ ℝ*,(hs1[×]s0)= c0))
  riotabidva(s0, cxr, hs0 = c0, (hs1[×]s0)= hs0, (hs1[×]s0)= c0)
  eqeq2d((hs1[×]s0), hs0, c0, (hs0 = c0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ*))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, s0 ∈ ℝ*)
  riotabidva(s0, cxr, hs1 = c1, (hs1[×]s0)= c0, (c1[×]s0)= c0)
  eqeq1d((hs1[×]s0), c0, (c1[×]s0), (hs1 = c1 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ*))
  oveq1d(hs1, cxmu, s0, c1, (hs1 = c1 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ*))
  simpl(hs1 = c1, s0 ∈ ℝ*)
  df-xdiv(hs0, hs1, s0)
  riotaex(s0, cxr, (c1[×]s0)= c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((ℝ \ { 0 }))
  diff.hs0.c(iota(s0 ∈ ℝ*,(c1[×]s0)= c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cxr)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((ℝ \ { 0 }))
  diff.hs1.c(iota(s0 ∈ ℝ*,(c1[×]s0)= c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: xrecex
blocks.content: Existence of reciprocal of nonzero real number. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrecex(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wrex(s0, cr, wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(s0)), nat1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wrex(s0, cr, wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(s0)), nat1)), wrex(s0, cr, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), nat1)))
  ax-rrecex(s0, c0)
  rexbidv2(s0, cr, cr, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), nat1))
  pm5.32d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), nat1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wb(wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), nat1))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wb(wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(s0)), nat1), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), nat1)))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cxmu, cv(s0)), nat1, co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  rexmul(c0, cv(s0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wne.s(s0, c0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: xmulcand
blocks.content: Cancellation law for extended multiplication. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm xmulcand(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cxmu, c1), co(c0, cxmu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
} = {
  impbid1(w0, wceq(co(c0, cxmu, c1), co(c0, cxmu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  rexlimddv(hs0, cr, w0, wi(wceq(co(c0, cxmu, c1), co(c0, cxmu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(hs0, cr, wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1)), wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0))
  xrecex(hs0, c0)
  syl5ib(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, c1), co(c0, cxmu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, co(c0, cxmu, c1)), co(cv(hs0), cxmu, co(c0, cxmu, c2))))
  oveq2(co(c0, cxmu, c1), co(c0, cxmu, c2), cv(hs0), cxmu)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, co(c0, cxmu, c1)), co(cv(hs0), cxmu, co(c0, cxmu, c2)), c1, c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  3eqtr3d(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, co(c0, cxmu, c1)), c1, co(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0), cxmu, c1), co(nat1, cxmu, c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0), cxmu, c1, nat1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0), cxmu, c1), co(cv(hs0), cxmu, co(c0, cxmu, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  xmulass(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))), wceq(co(nat1, cxmu, c1), c1), wcel(c1, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  xmulid2(c1)
  3eqtr3d(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, co(c0, cxmu, c2)), c2, co(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0), cxmu, c2), co(nat1, cxmu, c2), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0), cxmu, c2, nat1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  eqtrd(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0), nat1, co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0), co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  xmulcom(cv(hs0), c0)
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0), cxmu, c2), co(cv(hs0), cxmu, co(c0, cxmu, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  rexrd(cv(hs0), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))
  rexrd(c0, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1)), wcel(c0, cr))
  xmulass(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))), wceq(co(nat1, cxmu, c2), c2), wcel(c2, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1)), wcel(c2, cxr))
  xmulid2(c2)
  oveq2(c1, c2, c0, cxmu)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wceq(co(c0, cxmu, c1), co(c0, cxmu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: xreceu
blocks.content: Existential uniqueness of reciprocals. Theorem I.8 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm xreceu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wreu(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wreu(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0)), wrex(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cxr, wral(hs0, cxr, wi(wa(wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wrex(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0)), wrex(hs0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1)))
  mpsyl(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wrex(hs0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1)), wss(cr, cxr), wrex(hs0, cr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1)))
  ressxr()
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0), wrex(hs0, cr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1)))
  xrecex(hs0, c1)
  ssrexv(hs0, cr, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0), wi(wrex(hs0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1)), wrex(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0))))
  rexlimdvaa(hs0, cxr, wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1), wrex(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))), wrex(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0), cxr), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0)), c0))
  xmulcld(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  3eqtr3d(co(c1, cxmu, co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0)), c0, co(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), cxmu, c0), co(nat1, cxmu, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  ad2antll(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1), wceq(co(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), cxmu, c0), co(nat1, cxmu, c0)))
  oveq1(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1, cxmu, c0)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))), wceq(co(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), cxmu, c0), co(c1, cxmu, co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  rexrd(c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1)))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))
  xmulass(c1, cv(hs0), c0)
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), nat1))), wceq(co(nat1, cxmu, c0), c0), wcel(c0, cxr))

  expcom(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr)), wi(wa(wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  3expa(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wi(wa(wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  syl5ib(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0))), wa(wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0))))
  eqtr3(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0, co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)))
  xmulcand(c1, cv(s0), cv(hs0), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0))))
  simp1(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))

  simp3l(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0))
  simp3r(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0))
  reu4(s0, hs0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0), wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), c0))
  eqeq1d(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0, co(c1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1, cxmu)

  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cxr, wceq(co(c1, cxmu, cv(s0)), c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(c1, cxmu, co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0)), c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cxmu, co(cv(hs0), cxmu, c0))
